text: Urbain Olivier (1810, Eysins - 1888) was a Swiss writer. The brother of Juste Olivier, he was well known from 1856 onwards as the author of numerous popular tales of rural life in the Canton of Vaud, especially of the region near Nyon. == External links == * * Category:1810 births Category:1888 deaths Category:People from Nyon District Category:Swiss writers in French
title: Urbain Olivier
